result.eng: The northern wind will be blowing.
result.ga: Beidh an ghaoth aduaidh ag séideadh
result.orig: Beidh an ghaoth aduaidh ag séideadh
result.html: Beidh an ghaoth aduaidh ag séideadhThe northern wind will be blowing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an ġaoṫ aduaiḋ ag séideaḋThe northern wind will be blowing.

result.eng: The southern wind will be blowing.
result.ga: Beidh an ghaoth aneas ag séideadh
result.orig: Beidh an ghaoth aneas ag séideadh
result.html: Beidh an ghaoth aneas ag séideadhThe southern wind will be blowing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an ġaoṫ aneas ag séideaḋThe southern wind will be blowing.

result.eng: The western wind will be blowing.
result.ga: Beidh an ghaoth aniar ag séideadh
result.orig: Beidh an ghaoth aniar ag séideadh
result.html: Beidh an ghaoth aniar ag séideadhThe western wind will be blowing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an ġaoṫ aniar ag séideaḋThe western wind will be blowing.

result.eng: The eastern wind will be blowing.
result.ga: Beidh an ghaoth anoir ag séideadh
result.orig: Beidh an ghaoth anoir ag séideadh
result.html: Beidh an ghaoth anoir ag séideadhThe eastern wind will be blowing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an ġaoṫ anoir ag séideaḋThe eastern wind will be blowing.

result.eng: I'm always biking against the wind.
result.ga: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaí
result.orig: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaí
result.html: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaíI'm always biking against the wind.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag roṫaíoċt in aġaiḋ na gaoiṫe i gcónaíI'm always biking against the wind.

result.html: Cuir an téip ar aghaidhWind the tape forward.
result.ponchtml: Cuir an téip ar aġaiḋWind the tape forward.

result.ga: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoithe
result.orig: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoithe
result.html: D'imigh sí ar nós na gaoitheShe left like the wind.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ sí ar nós na gaoiṫeShe left like the wind.

result.html: In éadan na gaoitheAgainst the wind.
result.ponchtml: In éadan na gaoiṫeAgainst the wind.

result.html: Tá an ghaoth ag séideadhThe wind is blowing.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ġaoṫ ag séideaḋThe wind is blowing.
